english.segment2: Before the world. You knew the plans for me. Before my heart believed. You came to my rescue. And now I'm found in love. There's nowhere else to run. You keep my life within. Your mighty hand. Oh God
english.segment3: CHORUS: There's no end to Your love. There's no end to Your love. You're with us. You're with us. There's nothing in this world. That could take You away. You're with us. You're with us
english.segment5: Before I call. I know You'll answer me. You'll make a way. Beyond what I could imagine. What could separate. From the love You give. I put my hope in everything. That You are. Oh God
english.segment7: There's no end to Your love. There's no end to Your love. You're with us. You're with us. There's nothing in this world. That could take You away. You're with us. You're with us
english.segment9: You reign in our hearts. You reign above all. Be lifted on high. You reign in our hearts. You reign above all. Be lifted on high. You reign in our hearts. You reign above all. Be lifted on high. You reign in our hearts. You reign above all. Be lifted on high
english.segment11: There's no end to Your love. There's no end to Your love. You're with us. You're with us. There's nothing in this world. That could take You away. You're with us. You're with us.
